value.title: Embrace Zero Trust with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about the Zero Trust model and how to implement Zero Trust into your organization.

value.title: Prepare your development environment for Azure development
value.excerpt: Learn how to choose and install the appropriate IDE for your requirements to help you build, deploy, monitor, and scale cloud-hosted solutions.

value.title: Run parallel tasks in Azure Batch with the Azure CLI
value.excerpt: Find out about the Azure Batch capabilities designed to help you efficiently run large-scale parallel and high-performance computing applications in the cloud.

value.title: Implement generic types and traits
value.excerpt: Understand what generic types and traits are and how to use them in Rust.

value.title: Secure Azure Active Directory users with Multi-Factor Authentication
value.excerpt: Learn how to use multi-factor authentication with Azure AD to harden your user accounts.

value.title: Secure your application by using OpenID Connect and Azure AD
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to enable users to authenticate in multiple systems by using their Azure AD identities.

value.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks
value.excerpt: Explore the options for Azure disk encryption to encrypt OS and data disks on existing and new virtual machines.

value.title: Store application data with Azure Blob storage
value.excerpt: Discover how to build an app that stores user files with Azure Blob storage, use Blob storage in a web app, and use the Azure Storage SDK for .NET Core.

value.title: Top 5 security items to consider before pushing to production
value.excerpt: Learn about the Site Reliability Engineering approach to the challenge of assuring reliability and gain a better understanding of why it matters.

value.title: Translate speech with the speech service
value.excerpt: Perform speech translation tasks with the speech service to translate spoken text to different languages.

value.title: Monitor and troubleshoot your end-to-end Azure network infrastructure by using network monitoring tools
value.excerpt: Learn how to investigate and diagnose problems in your Azure virtual networks by using Network Watcher and other tools.

value.title: Troubleshoot inbound network connectivity for Azure Load Balancer
value.excerpt: Learn how to troubleshoot inbound network connectivity for Azure Load Balancer.

value.title: Upload, download, and manage data with Azure Storage Explorer
value.excerpt: Azure Storage Explorer allows you to quickly view all the storage services under your account. You can browse through, read, and edit data stored in those services through a user-friendly graphical interface.

value.title: How to edit and debug code in real time with Visual Studio Code Live Share | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you’ll learn how to instantly and securely share your current project, debugging session, terminal instance, localhost web app, and voice and text chat with Live Share extension for Visual Studio Code.     For more tips and tricks, visit: https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks

value.title: How to host a static website with Azure Storage | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how you can host a static website running in Azure Storage in a few steps. value.title: How to use Azure Monitor Application Insights to record custom events | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to use Azure Monitor Application Insights to make your application logging smarter with Custom Event Tracking. value.title: How to use deployment slots on Azure App Service | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, you will learn how to set up staging environments in Azure App Service by using deployment slots.   Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com    Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal      And make sure

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore non-relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore non-relational data in Azure

topItems.title: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure

topItems.title: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure

topItems.title: Manage non-relational data stores in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore non-relational data stores in Azure

value.title: Introduction to AI technology for business leaders
value.excerpt: This learning path helps business leaders discover and describe the primary concepts of AI, and the transformational impact AI can have in their organization.

topItems.title: Introduction to AI technology
topItems.excerpt: Learn the primary concepts and technologies of AI, and how Microsoft is turning the latest AI into tools, products, and services that organizations can leverage

topItems.title: Examine the Microsoft approach to artificial intelligence
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Microsoft creates products, services, and solutions to help organizations leverage AI. Understand how these technologies relate to business problems.

value.title: Add and size disks in Azure virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn about your virtual machine storage options and how to choose between standard and premium, managed and unmanaged disks for your Azure virtual machine.

value.title: Analyze costs and create budgets with Azure Cost Management
value.excerpt: Learn how to use cost analysis to understand how your costs accrue each month.

value.title: Create a long-running serverless workflow with Durable Functions
value.excerpt: Learn how to orchestrate a long-running workflow as a set of activities using scalable and cost-effective Durable Functions.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence
value.excerpt: Learn how to design an Azure architecture that uses modern practices and gives you full visibility into what's happening in your environment.

value.title: Build a web app with Blazor WebAssembly and Visual Studio Code
value.excerpt: Learn how to set up your development environment and build your first WebAssembly app with Blazor, Visual Studio Code, and C#.

value.title: Capture and view page load times in your Azure web app with Application Insights
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll configure Application Insights and use it to study page load data for an Azure web app.

value.title: Choose a compute provisioning solution for your application
value.excerpt: Discover the services and tools available to automate the deployment and configuration of your Azure infrastructure.

value.title: Understand virtualization
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Take a deep dive into virtualization by understanding its formal definition as well as the different types of virtual machines.

value.title: Deploy Azure virtual machines from VHD templates
value.excerpt: Standardize and automate your virtual machine deployments to minimize manual configuration, variance, and error.

value.title: Develop, test, and publish Azure Functions by using Azure Functions Core Tools
value.excerpt: Find out how to develop an Azure Function in Visual Studio with a test framework to create, deploy, and test this scalable and secure service.

value.title: Encrypt network traffic end to end with Azure Application Gateway
value.excerpt: Secure the traffic from your users all the way to your web servers by enabling TLS encryption on Application Gateway.
